data.name: AboutDetails
data.value: This unique code identifies you to other CovidTracer users.

data.name: AboutFreeSoftware
data.value: CovidTracer is a free and open-source software.

data.name: DetailsInteractionPositiveDetails
data.value: You have been in close contact with one or several positive cases to the new coronavirus.

data.name: DetailsInteractionSymptomaticDetails
data.value: You have been in close contact with one or several people with symptoms similar to those of the new coronavirus.

data.name: MainPrivacyDetails
data.value: CovidTracer respects your privacy and does not transmit personal data over the Internet. Respect as much as possible social distancing measures recommended by your local government.

data.name: MainStatusSafeText
data.value: No interaction with a positive case detected.

data.name: MainStatusSymptomaticText
data.value: You have been in contact with one or several symptomatic cases to COVID-19.

data.name: MainStatusPositiveText
data.value: You have been in contact with one or several positive cases to COVID-19.

data.name: OnboardingBluetooth
data.value: CovidTracer uses Bluetooth to anonymously notify you of any contact that you may have had with people infected with coronavirus.

data.name: OnboardingPrivacy
data.value: CovidTracer is totally anonymous and does not collect your personal data or location. CovidTracer respects your privacy.

data.name: OnboardingRecommendedUses
data.value: For maximum efficiency, opens the app or let it run in background when you interact with people external to your household (transports, office, grocery stores, outdoor activities...).

data.name: SignalingNotice
data.value: By filling this form, CovidTracer users with whom you may have interacted during your infectious period will be notified anonymously.

data.name: SignalingFormConfirmText
data.value: This operation can not be reverted.

data.name: SignalingSuccessText
data.value: Your infection has been successfully reported.

data.name: SignalingFailureText
data.value: Operation failed, please try again later.

data.name: SignalingAlreadyDoneText
data.value: Your infection has already been successfully signalled.
